data.title: Grants — Ball Brothers Foundation
data.text:
Privacy Policy

Ball Brothers Foundation is committed to respecting the privacy of visitors to its website. By visiting the Ball Brothers Foundation’s website, you are accepting these policies and disclaimers.

Ball Brothers Foundation may collect two types of information from website visitors: personal information and non-personal information. Visitors’ information may be collected, for example, to respond to requests for information and to correspond with grant applicants. Visitors may also follow the prompts on our website to sign up for periodic e-newsletters from Ball Brothers Foundation. You may unsubscribe from our newsletter at any time. If you experience any challenges unsubscribing, please contact us. We may also compile aggregate information to monitor site traffic, develop site content, and to make overall improvements to our website. Security measures are in place to protect visitor information, however, transmission and storage of on-line information cannot be completely guaranteed.

Standard internet “cookie” technology may be used on this website. Most internet browsers allow users to erase or otherwise disable cookies. Please note that these actions may limit some functionalities of our website.

Ball Brothers Foundation’s website may provide links to other third-party resources. Linked sites have different privacy policies, and we recommend that you read these privacy policies and terminate your visit to these sites if you do not agree with the privacy policies. Though the Ball Brothers Foundation may provide links to other third-party sites, we do not necessarily endorse or support the linked resources or organizations they represent.

We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy and other information on our website at any time without notice. Please return to this policy from time to time to ensure you have read the most up-to-date information.

Updated April 24, 2014
